column6: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.

Haste
Whenever you cast a spell, if it’s the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Hexproof #(This creature can’t be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)#
Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

column6: “Thraben is our home and I will not see it fall to this unhallowed horde.”

column6: The worst part isn't the pain, or the smell, or even the fear of death. It's hearing the clatter of bones on stone and knowing the bones are yours.
column9:
Abrupt Decay can’t be countered by spells or abilities.
Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.
